snippet: Yury Trofimov won the fourth stage of the Critérium du Dauphiné in France, and Chris Froome recovered from a punctured tire to keep the overall lead by 12 seconds over Alberto Contador.
lead_paragraph: Yury Trofimov won the fourth stage of the Critérium du Dauphiné in France, and Chris Froome recovered from a punctured tire to keep the overall lead by 12 seconds over Alberto Contador.

headline.main: Froome Maintains Lead of Critérium du Dauphiné
